description: Worked on 2 client projects since inspection stage using Java on Spring Boot and MongoDB contributing around 60,000 lines of code. Focus was to implement business logic and develop REST APIs where I faced and solved challenges like sending Mails and SMS, generating CSV files, and building MongoDB queries & aggregation pipelines using MongoClient resulting in 40% faster API response.

Developed a web app to showcase the Alumni Relations Cell of Maharaja Surajmal Institute, Delhi. The app displays events, teams, and galleries. Utilized React.js and Tailwind CSS for the client side, and a headless CMS, Sanity, for the server side.

Developed a web portfolio for Melius - Consulting and Analytics Club, Delhi, showcasing their teams, events, and projects. Utilized React.js and Tailwind CSS to build a seamless user interface for the client-side application.
